message.raw:
Fixed R_PROFILE_USER bug that caused R installation to crash.
Added additional calls to addsitedir to make sure site.py always knows about new eggs it needs.
Hopefully fixed DISPLAY issue that popped up x-term window when asking what CRAN server to use.

message:
Fixed R_PROFILE_USER bug that caused R installation to crash.
Added additional calls to addsitedir to make sure site.py always knows about new eggs it needs.
Hopefully fixed DISPLAY issue that popped up x-term window when asking what CRAN server to use.
